description: Configurable thresholds for performance metrics based on Google Core Web Vitals standards

largestContentfulPaint.description: Time to render largest visible element (LCP)

firstInputDelay.description: Time from first user interaction to browser response (FID)

cumulativeLayoutShift.description: Visual stability - measures unexpected layout shifts (CLS)

lcp.poor: Google ranking penalty + 53% of mobile users abandon slow sites
lcp.needsImprovement: Slow page load affects user experience and conversions
lcp.good: Fast page load improves engagement and SEO

cls.poor: Poor user experience, accidental clicks, frustrated users
cls.needsImprovement: Layout shifts reduce user trust and engagement
cls.good: Stable layout provides smooth user experience

fid.poor: Site feels unresponsive, users may leave before interacting
